title: Java Developer
description:

title: Frontend Developer
description:
Role: Frontend Developer
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Experience: 0‚Äì1 years
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ12\\-15 LPA
 



 Company: GoodSpace AI
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



  





 GoodSpace AI is an AI\\-powered hiring platform helping job seekers find jobs faster and companies hire pre\\-screened, AI\\-interviewed candidates within 24 hours. As we scale, we‚Äôre looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to help build world\\-class user experiences for millions of job seekers.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We are hiring a Frontend Developer who is passionate about creating clean, fast, and intuitive UI. You will work closely with the product, backend, and design teams to deliver high\\-quality web and app experiences using modern frontend technologies.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  





 Develop responsive, high\\-performance UI for web and mobile interfaces.
 



  





 Convert UI/UX designs from Figma into functional, pixel\\-perfect components.
 



  





 Build reusable, modular, and scalable frontend components.
 



  





 Optimize application performance and page load times.

 Ensure cross\\-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
 



  





 Maintain code quality through proper testing and best practices.

 Required Skills \\& Experience
 



  





 1‚Äì4 years of experience in frontend development.
 



  





 Strong proficiency in React.js / Next.js (preferred stack).
 



  





 Good knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6\\+).

 What We Offer

 Flexible work culture and high ownership.
 



  





 Work directly with the founding team on core projects.
 



  





 Freedom to explore new technologies and tools.

title: Software Engineer, Backend (Gen AI)
description:
**About Pentimenti.ai** 

 At Pentimenti.ai, we are on a mission to revolutionise the bid and proposal management industry. Based in Denmark and now building our core engineering team in Bangalore, we are developing a pioneering enterprise SaaS platform that leverages the power of Generative AI to automate and elevate the entire bid lifecycle. We are a small, ambitious team solving complex problems, and we're looking for a passionate builder to help us shape the future of our product and the industry.
 



  




**About the Role** 

 We are seeking a talented and driven mid\\-level Backend Software Engineer to join our foundational team in Bangalore. This is not just a coding role; you will be a critical part of our AI engine room, responsible for designing, building, and scaling the complex backend systems that power our Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG) solutions. You will tackle challenges in advanced retrieval, context engineering, and long\\-running asynchronous processing, directly impacting our platform's intelligence and performance. As an early member of the team, you will have significant ownership and a clear path for growth into a leadership position.
 



  




**What You'll Do:** 
* Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable backend services using Python and FastAPI.
* Architect and implement production\\-grade Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines for our core proposal generation engine.
* Build and manage complex, long\\-running asynchronous workflows (e.g., multi\\-document analysis, compliance report generation) using
 **Azure Function Apps** 
 , particularly leveraging orchestrators and activity functions (Durable Functions).
* Work extensively with our database stack, including
 **MongoDB** 
 for application data and
 **Qdrant** 
 for vector search and retrieval.
* Implement and refine techniques in prompt engineering, context engineering, and advanced retrieval to improve the quality and relevance of our AI\\-generated content.
* Collaborate closely with a small, cross\\-functional team to define features, solve problems, and deliver high\\-quality solutions.
* Take full ownership of features from conception to deployment, embodying a product\\-first mindset to ensure our solutions effectively solve customer problems.



  




**Who You Are (Required Qualifications):** 
* **3\\+ years** 
 of professional software engineering experience, with a strong focus on backend development.
* **1\\+ year of hands\\-on, production\\-level experience** 
 building and deploying applications powered by Generative AI (specifically with RAG architectures).
* Strong proficiency in
 **Python** 
 and experience building APIs with frameworks like
 **FastAPI** 
 (or Django/Flask).
* Demonstrable, in\\-depth experience with
 **Azure Function Apps** 
 for creating complex, stateful, and asynchronous workflows. This is a must\\-have skill.
* Practical experience working with both NoSQL databases (e.g.,
 **MongoDB** 
 ) and vector databases (e.g.,
 **Qdrant** 
 , Pinecone, Weaviate).
* Experience integrating with third\\-party LLM APIs (e.g., Azure OpenAI, Google Gemini/PaLM).
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and a strong foundation in data structures and system design.
* A strong sense of ownership, adaptability, and a product\\-first mindset. You're motivated by seeing your work solve real\\-world problems.
* Must be based in or willing to relocate to Bangalore.



  




**Nice\\-to\\-Haves (Preferred Qualifications):** 
* Familiarity with AI frameworks like LangChain or LangGraph.
* Experience with building AI agents or multi\\-agent systems.
* Prior experience working in a fast\\-paced startup environment.
* An interest in mentoring junior engineers and growing into a technical leadership role.



  




**Why Join Us?** 
* **Impactful Work:** 
 Be a core contributor to a cutting\\-edge AI product that is transforming an entire industry.
* **Deep Tech Challenges:** 
 Work on complex and interesting problems at the intersection of AI, data, and enterprise software.
* **Growth Opportunity:** 
 As an early hire in our Bangalore team, you have an unparalleled opportunity to grow with the company into a leadership role.
* **Strong Team Culture:** 
 Join a small, dedicated team that values ownership, collaboration, and innovation.
* **Competitive Compensation \\& Benefits.**

title: Software Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Unisire is an edtech platform that provides structured roadmaps, curated learning resources, and career\\-focused guidance for modern learners. It organizes official documentation, high\\-quality courses, and YouTube content into well\\-defined learning paths to simplify and accelerate skill development. Unisire helps students and professionals build real\\-world technical and career skills with clarity and confidence.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time remote position for an Experienced Software Developer. The role involves designing, developing, and maintaining scalable applications across modern technologies. Daily responsibilities include writing clean and efficient code, architecting new features, optimizing performance, debugging complex issues, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and ensuring smooth deployment of high\\-quality software. This role is ideal for candidates who have strong development experience and can contribute actively to a fast\\-growing platform.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* 1‚Äì2\\+ years of professional experience in software development
* Strong understanding of programming fundamentals, system design, and problem\\-solving

* Hands\\-on experience with frontend development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React, Next.js, or Angular
* Experience working with databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
* Comfortable with Git, GitHub, CI/CD workflows, and development best practices
* Ability to debug, test, and optimize scalable applications
* Strong logical thinking, ownership mindset, and willingness to learn new technologies

* Comfortable communicating in English and Hindi
* Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a remote team environment

title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ12 ‚Äì 15 LPA
 



 Experience: 1 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-1‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.

 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 ModernPixel is a software development agency dedicated to creating scalable, user\\-focused digital solutions for businesses and startups. We specialize in developing elegant frontends, robust backends, and high\\-performance products that prioritize quality and impact. Our services include web and mobile app development, custom software, and UI/UX design. With a team of innovative professionals, we deliver clean code, reliable architecture, and efficient iterations to bring ideas to life.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a contract remote role for a Senior Frontend Developer. We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Frontend Developer who‚Äôs extremely comfortable with React and Next.js, understands scalable frontend architecture, and can take full ownership of features from planning to deployment. You‚Äôll work closely with product, design, and backend teams to build fast, reliable, and visually polished web experiences.
 


**Key Responsibilities** 
* Design and develop high\\-quality, scalable, and maintainable frontend features using
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 , and
 **TypeScript** 
 .
* Architect reusable UI components and ensure strong code structure and predictable state management.
* Collaborate with designers to translate Figma designs into pixel\\-perfect, responsive interfaces.
* Optimize performance across Lighthouse metrics: load, interaction, bundle size, SEO, and accessibility.
* Implement secure client\\-side logic, API integrations, caching strategies, and SSR/ISR/SSG patterns.
* Participate in code reviews and lead best practices across the frontend team.
* Own features end\\-to\\-end ‚Äî planning, estimation, development, testing, and post\\-release improvements.
* Mentor junior developers and contribute to team\\-level engineering decisions.


**Required Skills** 
* 4‚Äì7\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in modern frontend development.
* Deep expertise in
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 ,
 **TypeScript** 
 , and
 **React Query / SWR** 
 .
* Strong understanding of SSR, SSG, ISR, routing, API routes, and app directory.
* Solid grasp of CSS frameworks (TailwindCSS preferred) and component\\-based styling.
* Experience with frontend performance optimization and accessibility standards.
* Familiarity with build tools like Turborepo, Vite, Webpack, or similar.
* Strong debugging skills and ability to work in complex codebases.
* Experience integrating REST and GraphQL APIs.


**Good to Have** 
* Understanding of micro\\-frontends and monorepo structures.
* Experience with state machines (XState), Zustand, Recoil, or Redux Toolkit.
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines, Docker, or cloud platforms (Vercel/AWS).
* Knowledge of testing tools like Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, or Playwright.


**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 
* Someone who takes ownership and can make architectural decisions confidently.
* Someone who keeps UX in mind while building feature\\-rich interfaces.
* Someone who knows modern frontend patterns and stays updated with the ecosystem.
* Someone who communicates clearly and enjoys solving problems with the team.

 Compensation: ‚Çπ12\\-15 LPA
 



 Company: GoodSpace (AI\\-powered Job \\& Career Platform)
 



  





 About GoodSpace
 



  





 GoodSpace is an AI\\-powered job platform helping job seekers find opportunities faster and helping employers hire more efficiently. Our AI engine powers personalized job recommendations, automated screening, and seamless career journeys. We‚Äôre expanding our engineering team to build scalable systems that support millions of users.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a Backend Developer who can design and build robust, scalable, and high\\-performance backend systems. You‚Äôll work closely with the product and AI teams to develop APIs, improve system architecture, and ensure high reliability across our platform.

title: Python Developer Intern
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Adorebits is a digital service provider specializing in Web, Mobile App Development, and Blockchain development for businesses across 52\\+ countries. Recognized as the official technical development partner by the European Chamber of Commerce, Adorebits brings over 10 years of expertise in delivering innovative IT solutions to global businesses. The company is dedicated to revolutionizing how businesses leverage technology with cutting\\-edge solutions. Adorebits is committed to providing value\\-driven and future\\-ready services to its clients.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a remote internship role for a Python Developer Intern. The intern will assist in back\\-end web development, software development, and implementing object\\-oriented programming concepts. Daily tasks include programming, database management, debugging, and developing scalable solutions using Python. The role is an excellent opportunity for candidates looking to gain hands\\-on experience in a fast\\-paced, innovative environment.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Strong knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) and general Programming practices
* Familiarity with Databases and their management
* Ability to adapt and learn quickly in a collaborative team environment
* Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Strong problem\\-solving and critical\\-thinking skills
* Prior experience or projects using Python is a plus


**Duration:**

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**About CloudRaft**
 CloudRaft pioneers AI and cloud\\-native platforms for global enterprises. Our environment thrives on creativity, collaboration, and innovation, empowering our team to solve complex challenges and deliver impactful results.
   

  

 Join us to be part of a team that values growth, excellence, and a passion for technology.
   

  

**Role: Platform Engineer**
 As a Platform Engineer at CloudRaft, you will architect and automate mission\\-critical infrastructure for diverse cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure). Your expertise will drive technical excellence and operational efficiency at scale.
   

  

**What You‚Äôll Do**
* Design and deploy architectures for customer platforms (Kubernetes experience is a plus, but not mandatory).
* Lead Infrastructure as Code efforts (Terraform, Crossplane) for environment automation.
* Build internal automation tooling to optimize deployment and maintenance (proficiency in Golang, TypeScript, or at least one major programming language required).
* Ensure high availability, scalability, and observability using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and Loki.
* Define and execute GitOps workflows using ArgoCD.
* Mentor junior engineers and drive continuous improvement across the team.
* Work independently with customers, serving as a guiding light for projects.


**What You Bring**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field.
* 5\\+ years in SRE, Platform Engineering, or DevOps roles.
* Experience with GitOps and cloud environments (Kubernetes experience is an advantage, not required).
* Expertise with AWS (including programming and automation using AWS services and SDKs); proficiency in other cloud platforms is a plus.
* Proficiency in at least one programming language such as Golang or TypeScript.
* Proven delivery of CI/CD and infrastructure at scale.
* Team player with strong communication skills and a growth mindset.
* Preferred: Open\\-source involvement.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
* Soft Skills: Customer empathy, ability to work independently with customers, and strong interpersonal skills.


**Immediate joiners who can join within 2 weeks are preferred.**

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 ModernPixel is a software development agency dedicated to creating scalable, user\\-focused digital solutions for businesses and startups. We specialize in developing elegant frontends, robust backends, and high\\-performance products that prioritize quality and impact. Our services include web and mobile app development, custom software, and UI/UX design. With a team of innovative professionals, we deliver clean code, reliable architecture, and efficient iterations to bring ideas to life.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a contract remote role for a Senior Backend Developer. We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Backend Developer who can own backend architecture, build reliable APIs, and ensure our systems scale smoothly. If you‚Äôre strong with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS services, you‚Äôll feel right at home.
 



  




**Key Responsibilities** 
* Design, build, and maintain scalable backend services using
 **Node.js** 
 (Express/Nest/Fastify).
* Architect clean and efficient REST or GraphQL APIs with proper versioning and documentation.
* Work extensively with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 ‚Äî schema design, indexing, query optimization, migrations.
* Implement caching, rate\\-limiting, background jobs, queues, and event\\-driven workflows.
* Manage deployments and infrastructure on
 **AWS** 
 (EC2, ECS/Lambda, RDS, S3, CloudWatch, IAM).
* Ensure strong security practices: auth, permissions, encryption, and data protection.
* Optimize service performance, reliability, and error monitoring.
* Collaborate closely with frontend, product, and QA to deliver end\\-to\\-end features.
* Conduct code reviews and contribute to backend engineering standards.


**Required Skills** 
* 4‚Äì7\\+ years of backend development experience.
* Expert\\-level proficiency in
 **Node.js** 
 , TypeScript, and modern backend frameworks.
* Strong command over
 **PostgreSQL** 
 ‚Äî complex queries, joins, triggers, indexing, performance tuning.
* Deep understanding of AWS fundamentals ‚Äî networking, IAM roles, logging, deployments.
* Experience working with ORMs (Prisma/TypeORM/Sequelize) or raw SQL.
* Familiarity with Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
* Solid understanding of distributed systems and API reliability patterns.
* Strong debugging skills with observability tools (CloudWatch, Sentry, Datadog, etc.).


**Good to Have** 
* Experience with microservices or monorepo architectures.
* Knowledge of Redis, RabbitMQ, SQS, or Kafka.
* Experience implementing automated tests (Jest, Supertest, Playwright for API).
* Exposure to infra\\-as\\-code (Terraform/CloudFormation).
* Understanding of security frameworks (OWASP, JWT, OAuth2\\).


**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 
* Someone who can think in terms of systems and architecture, not just endpoints.
* Someone comfortable handling scale, performance issues, and production\\-grade deployments.
* Someone who can take ownership, communicate clearly, and mentor others.
* Someone who enjoys solving problems and building reliable backend foundations.

title: Senior Test Automation and tool Engineer- (Java/Python)
description:

You will also develop test automation suites for customer projects across industries such as Automotive, Transport, and Logistics.
 



  





**Your key responsibilities include:** 



* Designing and developing automated tests (integration, acceptance, performance).

* Troubleshooting and resolving code\\-related issues for enhancements and change requests.

* Implementing and testing automated solutions.
* Collaborating with stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver JIRA sync solutions.

* Supporting stakeholders by debugging issues in developed solutions.

**Who Are You?** 




 You are a proactive and collaborative engineer with a passion for automation and continuous improvement. You bring:
 


* A Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

 HERE is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, parental status, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics.

title: Senior Backend Engineer | Founding Team
description:
**Title : Senior Backend Engineer \\| Founding Team** 




 Location: Bengaluru / Hybrid
 



 Experience: 6‚Äì10 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time \\| Founding Team \\|
 



  





**About DecisionX** 




 www.decisionx.ai
 



  





 We‚Äôre building a Self\\-Learning, Context\\-Aware Decision AI ‚Äî one that uses Ontology, Context, and AI Agents to reimagine how humans and organisations make complex decisions. Our platform learns continuously, understands intent, and reasons across information ‚Äî bringing clarity to the moments that matter most.
 



  





 We‚Äôre a small team of serial founders, engineers, physicists, product artists, and builders who believe:
 



 ‚ÄúThe future will be shaped not by those with the most data, but by those who decide best.‚Äù
 



  





 Our mission is bold yet simple ‚Äî to build the last piece of Decision Intelligence humanity will ever need, empowering better choices for today‚Äôs world and for the futures yet to come.
 



  





 Headquartered in Bangalore and San Francisco, DecisionX is led by a global team advancing the next frontier of Reasoning and Decision AI.
 



  





  





**What You'll Build** 




 Data Backbone
 


* ETL/ELT pipelines for structured/unstructured data from ERP, APIs, warehouses, files
* Data models for time\\-series, hierarchical dimensions, multi\\-billion row aggregations
* OLAP query layers: sub\\-second performance on complex analytics
* Streaming/batch ingestion with exactly\\-once semantics
* Tech: ClickHouse, Druid, Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Airflow, Kafka



 Backend \\& APIs
 


* Microservices architecture with clean boundaries and fault isolation
* RESTful/GraphQL APIs that are simple to use, impossible to misuse
* Async processing, job orchestration, distributed workflows
* High availability, horizontal scale, graceful degradation
* Tech: Python/Java/Go, Celery, Temporal, RabbitMQ, Redis, Kubernetes



 Agent Orchestration
 


* Multi\\-step agent workflows: goal decomposition, task coordination, learning loops
* Stateful execution engines tracking decision context across sessions
* Reasoning loops where agents query, simulate, and update plans autonomously
* Abstractions for LLMs, analytical models, optimization solvers
* Error recovery, retries, human\\-in\\-the\\-loop patterns



 Numerical Analytics at Scale
 


* High\\-volume, high\\-dimensional datasets: sales, financials, operational KPIs
* Aggregation engines for dashboards, anomaly detection, RCA
* Query optimization: indexing, materialized views, pre\\-aggregation, caching
* Statistical/ML analytics: forecasting, outlier detection, correlation analysis
* Numerical accuracy and consistency in distributed systems



  





**You Must Have** 




  





**Backend:** 



* 3\\-7 years building distributed systems in production
* Expert in Python, Java, or Go
* Microservices, API design, async processing (Celery, Kafka, RabbitMQ)
* Distributed systems: consistency, partitioning, replication, fault tolerance



  





**Data:** 



* ETL/ELT pipelines processing millions of records daily
* Data warehouses/OLAP: Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, ClickHouse, or Druid
* Strong SQL, query optimization, data modeling (star schemas, time\\-series)
* Orchestration tools: Airflow, Prefect, or Dagster



 Quantitative:
 


* Large\\-scale numerical datasets: financials, metrics, time\\-series
* Aggregation strategies, rollups, pre\\-computation
* Numerical precision and correctness in distributed systems



 Infrastructure:
 


* AWS, GCP, or Azure in production
* Docker, CI/CD, infrastructure\\-as\\-code
* Monitoring/logging/alerting: Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog



  





**Mindset:** 



* You've debugged distributed systems at 3 AM and shipped the fix
* You understand trade\\-offs: ClickHouse vs. Snowflake, when to denormalize, when to cache
* You write code other engineers want to read



 Bonus:
 


* Worked in the domain of BI platforms, dashboards, analytics engines before
* Agentic AI, LLM orchestration, reasoning workflows excite you
* Startup/founding team experience in the past



 Why Join
 



  





 Founding Team: Meaningful equity, outsized influence on architecture and culture, direct founder collaboration.
 



 Technical Leverage: Build systems powering Fortune 500 decision\\-making. Deep technical work \\= defensible moats.
 



 Domain: Enterprise decision intelligence is infrastructure, not a feature. You'll work at the intersection of distributed systems, data engineering, agentic AI, and decision science.
 



 Ownership: This isn't a job. It's a chance to build something that matters and own a piece of it.

title: iOS Developer
description:
UWorld is a leader in online test prep for college entrance, undergraduate, graduate, and professional licensing exams throughout the United States. Since 2003, over 2 million students have trusted us to help them prepare for high\\-stakes examinations.
 



  





 We are seeking an iOS developer who is passionate about creating an excellent user experience and enjoy taking on new challenges. The iOS app developer will be responsible for the development, testing, and support of our native iOS apps for online test delivery platforms.
 



  





**Your Role:** 



* Create Storyboards and Develop native UI screens using native iOS components.
* Leverage hybrid technologies when applicable to minimize development effort across multiple mobile platforms.
* Participate in end\\-to\\-end development of features, including performance monitoring and app analytics.
* Consume REST services to provide an interactive experience for end\\-users with real\\-time data.
* Collaborate with Senior Software developers and team lead in establishing and employing best practices for code sharing and development to ensure common code base abstraction across all applications.
* Continuously review other platform\\-specific features to see if the same can be implemented in the iOS platform.



**Environment:** 
 Swift, Objective\\-C, iOS SDK, Relational Databases (MS\\-SQL, MySQL, etc), NoSQL (MongoDB, CosmosDB, etc), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, TypeScript, Bootstrap, Material Design principles.
 



  





**Requirement:** 



* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (preferred but not a must)
* 3 \\- 5 years of experience in native iOS application development using Objective\\-C and Swift
* Strong understanding of OOPS concepts and design
* Experience in launching at least one commercially deployed application.
* Experience integrating with external APIs/web services (with REST, SOAP, etc.)
* Experience working with design patterns and creating custom UI controls.



  





**Soft Skills** 
 :
 


* Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and written English
* Excellent interpersonal skills demonstrating the ability to articulate ideas clearly, concisely, and persuasively
* Excellent attention to detail and organization skills and ability to understand direction and feedback
* Ability to work effectively within a changing environment that is going through high growth
* Exceptional follow\\-through, personal drive, and the desire to make a difference

title: Android Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Love On Clicks is India‚Äôs leading platform designed to enhance romantic relationships and bonding for modern couples. Combining technology, creativity, and romance, the platform offers unique experiences, such as fun couple challenges, Instagram\\-style story templates, personalized romantic countdowns, and gamified engagement with LoveLink Coins. With an innovative focus on millennials and Gen Z, Love On Clicks bridges the gap between emotions and technology. Our mission is to empower couples to strengthen their bonds and create lasting memories effortlessly.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site Android Developer role located in Ahmedabad. As an Android Developer, you will collaborate with the development team to design, build, and maintain high\\-performance mobile applications. The role involves translating technical requirements into functional features, debugging and optimizing app performance, continuously improving user experiences, and staying updated on the latest trends in Android development.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Mobile Application Development and Mobile Applications design
* Strong skills in Android Design and Android Development
* Experience with Software Development processes and methodologies
* Ability to troubleshoot and optimize code for improved performance
* Excellent problem\\-solving abilities and attention to detail
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Familiarity with integrating gamification and interactive features into applications is a plus
* Understanding of Gen Z and millennial user experience preferences is advantageous

title: Flutter Developer
description:

**FlutterflowDevs** 
 is a Flutter/Flutterflow development company that specializes in creating iOS, Android, and web applications in an affordable and efficient manner. Our team of certified FlutterFlow/ Flutter experts collaborate closely with our clients to deliver top\\-notch performance\\-centric, secure and scalable apps and web apps.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 FlutterflowDevs is hiring a full\\-time Flutter Developer for an on\\-site role located in Jaipur. As a Flutter Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing and maintaining high\\-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* At least 2\\-3 years Flutter Experience Developer required.

title: Firmware / Embedded Engineer ‚Äì Vending Machine Controller Development
description:
Company: Tripundra Industries
   

 Location: Hyderabad (On\\-site Preferred)
   

  

 We are building our own next\\-generation Vending Machine Controller (VMC) and automation platform. We‚Äôre looking for a Firmware / Embedded Engineer who can take ownership of real\\-time control systems ‚Äî motors, sensors, elevator logic, communication modules, and board bring\\-up.
   

  

 This is a high\\-impact role with full freedom to build, innovate, and shape our core hardware product.
   

  

  

 üîç Responsibilities
   

  

 Develop firmware for custom vending controller boards (ESP32 / STM32 / ARM MCUs).
   

  

 Motor control: DC motors, stepper motors, motor drivers, and conveyor logic.
   

  

 Work on elevator control system (up/down sequence, limit sensors, timing, retries).
   

  

 Interface sensors: IR, opto sensors, limit switches, temperature sensors.
   

  

 Board bring\\-up, debugging, pin mapping, schematics understanding.
   

  

 Implement communication protocols: UART, SPI, I2C, RS485\\.
   

  

 Run prototype testing and machine\\-level validation.
   

  

 Collaborate with backend team for cloud integration (Phase\\-2\\).
   

  

 Document firmware architecture, test cases, wiring diagrams.
   

  

 üí° Requirements
   

  

 1‚Äì4 years of experience in Embedded Systems or Firmware Development.
   

  

 Strong knowledge of C/C\\+\\+ for microcontrollers.
   

  

 Experience with ESP32, STM32, ARM Cortex\\-M or similar MCUs.
   

  

 Hands\\-on with FreeRTOS / multitasking environments.
   

  

 Good understanding of PWM, timers, ADC, GPIO configuration.
   

  

 Experience in debugging using multimeter, oscilloscope, logic analyzer (good to have).
   

  

 Ability to work independently on hardware‚Äìfirmware integration.
   

  

 ‚≠ê Good to Have
   

  

 Experience working on vending machines, kiosks, automation, robotics, or mechatronics.
   

  

 Worked with communication modules (WiFi, BLE, GSM, Modbus).
   

  

 Experience creating small control boards (motor driver boards, sensor boards).
   

  

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 üéØ Why Join Tripundra?
   

  

 Work on India‚Äôs fastest\\-growing smart vending tech ecosystem.
   

  

 End\\-to\\-end ownership of firmware for a hardware product going into 1000\\+ machines.
   

  

 Direct interaction with CTO, mechanical engineers, and product team.
   

  

 Opportunity to lead embedded team as product scales.
